page.title: 05Youth and Community Centre
page.content: The Youth and Community Centre is attached to the John of Gaunt School. There is a full-time Warden who is a trained Youth Leader and teacher, voluntary and partime helpers. There are Youth Clubs for children held on 3 evenings a week with many differing activities organised. There is a hockey and a football team attached to the Centre. A coffee bar is an excellent facility During the day the Centre is used by the Ladybird Club, a club for pre-nursery school age children.Wives Group and Womens Institute hold meetings in the Centre. A Sports Hall is available for hire by the community with badminton courts, five a side football and indoor cricket facilities.
